message.name: ERR_QUESTIONGROUP_EXISTS
message.locale: The question group ID already exists!

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_HEADER
message.locale: The following scripts will be affected if you alter this item.

message.name: ID_GROUP_MODIFICATION_ERROR
message.locale: You cannot delete this Question Group. It is referenced by script '%1s'.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_ID_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A script with the ID '%1s' already exists.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_QUESTION_VALIDATION_ERROR
message.locale: Validation failed on script '%1s'.Cannot make this change to question page.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_HYPERLINK_LABEL_VALIDATION_ERROR
message.locale: Validation failed on script '%1s'. Cannot make this change to question page.

message.name: ID_VALIDATION_ERROR
message.locale: Invalid ID '%1s'. It must begin with a letter or underscore.

message.name: ID_QUESTION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Available values are listed in the code table '%1s'.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_PAGE_VALIDATION_ERROR
message.locale: Validation failed. The Question page, '%1s', must contain a question group.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_VALIDATION_ERROR
message.locale: Validation failed. The Script must contain at least one Question Page.
